title: gmdisnuts
author: gmdisnuts
created_time: August 17, 2023, 06:05:32 PMLast edit: March 14, 2024, 01:53:59 AM by gmdisnuts
content: MuskyDoge is nearly 3 years old now. It's still going. Started out as a meme and now turned into a business. There's a few "MuskyDoge" themed games but decided not to limit it there. With the release of Backyard Paintball which is in beta testing on google play, soon for iOS after it's approved. MuskyDoge is also exploring e-sports with it's creation. Check out MuskyDoge.net for more information. All profits from ads and in game purchasing will go to the charts. Operating like a stock.EDIT: When this was first posted it was at 40K marketcap, rightfully so everyone said it was basically trash and will die soon. It's still very low 100K marketcap with the foot on the gas. This won't be the last time you hear about these guys.

comments.author: Tazz90
comments.body: 2 years project on BsC and still active and bulding is strong and good team to make that, have huge potential ðŸ”¥

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: It's dead, just a meme-token- Low follower- Dead community chat- Low impression of social media- Game are creating is only basic, any developer can build these without need fundraising + a lot money- Meme tokenStop promoting people for a meme-token, without zero utility. All they can do just (burn, listing, creating 5+ years old game without really hard coding) I believe you can hired someone on (FIVER) to created that.

comments.author: gmdisnuts
comments.body: Quote from: ryzaadit on August 17, 2023, 06:42:48 PMIt's dead, just a meme-token- Low follower- Dead community chat- Low impression of social media- Game are creating is only basic, any developer can build these without need fundraising + a lot money- Meme tokenStop promoting people for a meme-token, without zero utility. All they can do just (burn, listing, creating 5+ years old game without really hard coding) I believe you can hired someone on (FIVER) to created that.It's just the beginning. There's more than one game. Even an FPS game. Your missing the point of Ads bringing in money to the charts from outside sources. Not just new investors to pay old investors LOL. The competition is slowly growing. Actually interesting enough, the people playing this game don't hold any crypto but are intrigued with winning crypto to play a game. There's definitely something here. Your right with low follower, community is weak, was really good in the bullmarket at 3M marketcap. This game is pretty basic, any developer can do it. But it's far from dead!!!

comments.author: Heulahee
comments.body: I had played it just for some time, but now the project is not facilitating its users, and I think it has the end of this project. And also it is a meme coin, and everyone is much familiar with the meme coin. So, it is one of the meme coin and that's why we couldn't expect more.

comments.author: f4rmacist
comments.body: Quote from: Heulahee on August 17, 2023, 07:13:43 PMI had played it just for some time, but now the project is not facilitating its users, and I think it has the end of this project. And also it is a meme coin, and everyone is much familiar with the meme coin. So, it is one of the meme coin and that's why we couldn't expect more.You played the new game or the mario style? MKD Climber just launched on the app stores. The competition ends September 1st. Pepe is a meme token that cracked 1 Billion marketcap with nothing special going. These guys at 36K marketcap. I am a holder but feel you are wrong about it being dead when the team is very active. Community is weak but most projects start out with a weak community. They have more plans and keep getting better. Community primarily on telegram. t.me/muskydogearmy and twitters growing at twitter.com/muskydogecoin Not saying it's going to be the next Pepe but I predict it gets to 1M marketcap at the end of the year. It's a scrappy little project that's been alive over 2 years. Most these 'meme' tokens die in a week. Just my 2 cents. Everyone loves an underdog story.

comments.author: gmdisnuts
comments.body: I'm just sharing the competition. More players = Ad money driving the price up. A better game with better leader board functionality in the works. MuskyDoge is like a stock. This concept really does prove to work even with a basic game. Shoot flappy bird was pulling $50,000 a day in ads with 0 giveaways and competitions. Somethings uhhhh brewing here.

comments.body: Quote from: gmdisnuts on August 17, 2023, 06:05:32 PMMuskyDoge is running a free play to earn competition.The name surely is a meme coin and I don't think too many people are still on it. Next, the play to earn saga is already done. Quote from: gmdisnuts on August 17, 2023, 06:05:32 PMAds used to fund the prize wallet and buy/burn tokens. Only on mobile app stores. It's a two year old project on the binance smart chain.The question is, how many users are there and how many ads are being displayed there? And burning tokens, they don't need funding on it unless they need to hype it and broadcast to the world that they're burning tokens with the use of their own money.Quote from: gmdisnuts on August 17, 2023, 06:05:32 PMLow cap. Check out MuskyDoge.net for more information. Low cap or likely dead? $0 volume. (https://coinmarketcap.com/dexscan/bsc/0xb8230e16efbeb40d172836acaf81d0a4a45ea6f9/)And with a note:Quote from: https://coinmarketcap.com/dexscan/bsc/0xb8230e16efbeb40d172836acaf81d0a4a45ea6f9/This page has been created automatically using onchain data and contains unverified information. comments.body: Stop promoting meme coins especially by saying that this is a potential project. I think there is nothing special about meme coins. All meme coins are shitcoins. I have seen that musky doges have low valuations due to low capitalization and low trust levels.

comments.body: Hello guys if you have good projects and best opportunities than you can shearing here any types of good projects like airdrop, free mining,free earning,events like this otherwise please avoid to shearing here any dead project thanks for understanding my dear.

The MuskyDoge project is really a poor project, they can't even install https and have a good design for their website.My advice would be better to stay away from this project as it is just a scam hoping for an MC to step into the project with no apparent utility.

comments.author: Odusko
comments.body: Quote from: Tazz90 on August 17, 2023, 06:14:15 PM2 years project on BsC and still active and bulding is a strong and good team to make that, have huge potential ðŸ”¥I have a contrary opinion to what makes a potential project and years of experience do not matter because what matters is how have the project performed within those years because some projects are just so inactive and are just meme jam coins that stay as a mirror coin without any value or activities to make it a potential project and this coin present all the attributes of such project. So I advise everyone to stay away from this coin because the ops are just trying to promote a dead project aiming to waste people's time in playing the so-called game.

Original post was almost 40K marketcap. Right now it's sitting at 100K. Not a huge gain but the momentum the past 7 days have been nice. This one's going to be a banger.

(https://coinmarketcap.com/dexscan/bsc/0xb8230e16efbeb40d172836acaf81d0a4a45ea6f9/)And with a note:Quote from: https://coinmarketcap.com/dexscan/bsc/0xb8230e16efbeb40d172836acaf81d0a4a45ea6f9/This page has been created automatically using onchain data and contains unverified information. Please DYOR.Still going, would recommend checking out muskydoge.net they've been working hard during the bear market. The products aren't just limited to musky themed games. They released a paintball game and are doing e-sports. It operates like a stock with 100K marketcap (microcap) right now. E-sports keeps getting bigger. Mobile gaming is in the multi billions. Buying into this project would be like investing in a startup company with a solid future. But as I said at 40K marketcap, we can circle back to this. So 100K right now. Lets see how much fun we can have with this post. I get it, all the other projects are sketchy. This will bring money from in app purchasing, and ads. There will also be free and paid tournaments. Not sure where your from but paintball is a very competitive sport. So having tournaments with cash prizes, people are going to want to buy top of the line equipment. It's not a clear pay to win, can play and grind. So pretty happy with what's going on. Will report back with bigger news

comments.author: cryptogamblr
comments.body: This is the example of never say dead. Sure some tokens pull lp and leave you in the dark. I have my fair share of those dead tokens I cannot sell. I appreciate the grind and never quit mentality. Many others have quit their projects before a year was up.
